definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[אִוׇּה]] Ps 132:13; [[אִוְּתָה]] Mic 7:1 +, etc.; Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּאַוֶּה]] De 12:20 + 4 t.—desire subj. usually [[נֶפֶשׁ]], obj. fruit Mic 7:1 (in metaph.); flesh (to eat) 1Sa 2:16, cf. De 12:20 (sq. inf. [[לֶאֱכׂל בָּשָׂר]]); food & drink De 14:26; of king desiring rule, [[וּמָלַכְתָּ בְּכׂל]] [[אֲשֶׁר־תְּאַוֶּה נַפְשֶָׁךָ]] 2Sa 3:21, 1Ki 11:37; obj. evil ([[רַע]]) Pr 21:10; once obj. ´[[י]] Is 26:9 [[נַפְשִׁי אִוִּיתִךָ בַּלַּיְלָה]]; of God [[וְנַפְשׁוֹ אִוְּתָה וַיַּעַשׂ]] Job 23:13; as desiring Zion for dwelling-place (late, only cases without [[נפשׁ]]) Ps 132:13, Ps 132:14;

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְאַוׇּת]] Pr 21:26; [[הִתְאַוֵּיתִי]] Je 17:16; [[הִתְאַוּוּ]] Nu 11:4; [[וְהִתְאַוִּיתֶם]] Nu 34:10; Impf. [[יִתְאַוֶּה]] Ec 6:2; [[וַיִּתְאַוֶּה]] 2Sa 23:15; apoc. [[וְיִתְאַו]] Ps 45:12, [[וַיִּתְאַו]] 1Ch 11:17, etc.—Pt. fs. [[מִתְאַוׇּה]] Pr 13:4; mpl. [[מִתְאַוִּים]] Am 5:18, Nu 11:34—desire, long for, lust after, of bodily appetites; for dainty food Nu 11:4 (E; sq. acc. cogn.) = Ps 106:14, Nu 11:34 (E); sq. [[ל]] Pr 23:3, Pr 23:6 cf. Ec 6:2 (sq. acc.), v. also Pr 13:4 (abs., subj. [[נֶפֶשׁ]]); abs. of extreme thirst 2Sa 23:15 = 1Ch 11:17; of king desiring the beauty ([[יְפִי]]) of princess Ps 45:12 (sq. acc.); of covetous man Pr 21:26 (sq. acc. cogn.); obj. [[בֵּית רֵעֲךָ]] De 5:18 (‖[[חמד]]); sq. inf. Pr 24:1 (of desiring evil companionship); obj. ´[[יוֹם י]] Am 5:18 (acc.; of presumptuous, reckless longing) cf. Je 17:16. (Nu 34:7, Nu 34:8 for [[תְּתָאוּ]]—Pi. of [[תאה]]—Di prop. [[תִּתְאַוֻּ]], & queries whether this & [[הִתְאַוִּיתֶם]] v:Nu 34:10 are not fr. [[אוה]], = desire for yourselves.)
